title: WA State Voter Dashboard
desc: A boot camp project working with APIs and the Foundation framework to create a dashboard to find candidates, ballot drop-off boxes, and news.

title: Helping Hand
desc: A boot camp project designed to provide crucial resources to people experiencing homelessness.

title: Note Taker
desc: A boot camp homework assignment that required use of Express routes to read, write, and delete from a JSON.

title: DS9 Employee Management System
desc: A boot camp homework assignment that required building a CLI to manage a MySQL database.
